backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human-written summaries describing each major frontend source file and its purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes for all pages and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying the logo, navigation links, contact info, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with logo, desktop nav, and mobile sheet menu showing active routes.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper that renders the header, page outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance, reacting to identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hooks handling login state, identity loading, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks interacting with the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and sets extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, radius, and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, mailto submission, clipboard fallback, and contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero banner, features, services overview, and promotional content.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays product details, features, benefits, and a hero section for the AI-driven reconciliation platform.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a services overview with detailed consulting service cards and structured sections.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors bound to CSS variables, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and required website features for ABM Nexttech LLP. Tracks current project state version and outlines incomplete branding fixes and deployment gaps.
